title: British Myths - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/15/21
itunes:title: British Myths - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/15/21
description:
George Noory and author Charles Christian explore his research into urban myths from around England, including werewolves and haunted houses, as well as his own paranormal experiences from childhood.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
